original_text: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
korean_text: 내 형제들아 너희는 선생된 우리가 더 큰 심판을 받을 줄 알고 선생이 많이 되지 말라

sentences.original_text: Not many of you should become teachers,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 많은 이가 선생이 되지 말라,

sentences.original_text: will be judged with greater strictness.
